gsd.inescid.math.algebra.matrix
Class MatrixUtil

java.lang.Object
  gsd.inescid.math.algebra.matrix.MatrixUtil

public class MatrixUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides useful modular matrix operations. No validation of the parameters is performed so check out for the ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException and any other unexpected result from the wrong matrix parameters size. This class assumes that the matrix as column index (col) and a row index (row) which are used in the following manner: matrix[row][col]

Author:
Rui

rModPow

public static java.math.BigInteger[][] rModPow(java.math.BigInteger[][] matrix,
                                               java.math.BigInteger e,
                                               java.math.BigInteger q)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
Recursive matrix exponentiation of a matrix using the exponentiation by squaring technique. (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Exponentiation_by_squaring)

Parameters:
matrix -
e - exponent
q - modulus
Returns:
matrix ^ e mod q
Throws:
java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - if e < 1

Parameters:

desiredPower -
q - modulus
Returns:
intermediate matrix power result
Throws:
java.security.InvalidAlgorithmParameterException - if desired exponent < 1
